properties.entry: SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_START , PROJECT_NO DESC

SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FUNDING DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING <= 50

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING BETWEEN 50 AND 100

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING >= 100
